nouns.description: tetracycline (countable and uncountable, plural tetracyclines) (abbreviated tet)

entries.meaning: (pharmacology, uncountable) A yellow crystalline broad-spectrum antibiotic C22H24N2O8 produced by streptomyces or synthetically.
(pharmacology, countable) Any of a large group of antibiotics with the same general structure derived from tetracene with many hydroxyl and other groups.
